item.title: Morris Katz Is 26 and Ready to Fix the Democrats’ Strategy
item.description: Part casting director, part media guru, Morris Katz is behind the biggest Democratic campaigns this cycle.

item.title: Xi’s Purge of China’s Military Brings Its Top General Down
item.description: The ouster of Gen. Zhang Youxia, who was second only to Xi Jinping in the military hierarchy, marks “the total annihilation of the high command,” one ...

item.title: New York City Schools Announce Remote Learning Day in Response to Storm
item.description: With as much as a foot of snow expected to fall across the city, schools will be closed on Monday, Mayor Zohran Mamdani said.

item.title: In Venezuela, Families Search for Relatives Who Are Detained and Missing

item.title: Why Japan’s Leader Won’t Enter the Male-Dominated Sumo Ring
item.description: Sanae Takaichi, the first woman to lead Japan as prime minister, skipped a sumo awards ceremony, reflecting her cautious approach to gender issues.
